error.message: Fetching deprecated class constant ENTITY_UPDATE of class Drupal\hook_event_dispatcher\HookEventDispatcherInterface. Deprecated in hook_event_dispatcher:3.1.0 and is removed from hook_event_dispatcher:4.0.0. Use Drupal\core_event_dispatcher\EntityHookEvents::ENTITY_UPDATE instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
